content:
Hi team. <@360491619402776577> 

"The Engine API supports a one-to-many Consensus Layer to Execution Layer configuration. Intuitively this is because the Consensus Layer drives the Execution Layer and thus can drive many of them independently."

via the spec, we should theoretically be able to handle a multiplex config

beacon
   -el1
   -el2
   -...elN

we have cluster configs in this setup, but the parallelized execution clients are having trouble staying synced in our lighthouse-geth setup. should we expect this multi-plex config to be supported in geth currently? or are 1-1 beacon/el required at this moment
